Producer: Emmanuel Chaumet, Federico Eibuszyc, Barbara Sarasola-Day, Marleen Slot, Ingmar Trost, Dan Wechsler, Jamal Zeinal Zade, Rachel Daisy Ellis
Production Co: Sutor Kolonko, Bord Cadre Films, Pucara Cine, Ecce Films
Synopsis: In the 1970s, a successful lawyer in Argentina has his life unravel when a private detective arrives in town and starts asking tough questions.
Title: Rojo
